short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App to add wishes to Gowish from any store page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The GoWish Chrome extension allows you to quickly add all your favorite products to a wishlist, no matter what store you are visiting or what products you dream to get. Simply find a product you like, press the wish extension button and add it to your wishlists so your friends and loved ones know what you are wishing for.
